title: Reborn with My Wife - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Brotherhood   Businessmen   College/University   Confident Protagonist   Couple Growth   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Parents   Early Romance   Familial Love   Fated Lovers   Heartwarming   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Modern Day   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Pregnancy   Second Chance

description: Waking up drunk, Gu Xia found that he had been reborn ten years ago, and his wife had also been reborn. Whether they should live separately, or reunite, Gu Xia felt that this was a question worth pondering.>
